Self awareness requires a willingness to look at our resistance to reality, our attachment to our self-image, and our underlying anxiety.

- Don Riso

Remember it is not self-control that produces change but self-knowledge and awareness.

- Russ Hudson

Understand the obstructions you are putting in the way of love, freedom, and happiness and they will drop. Turn on the light of awareness and the darkness will disappear.” -

- Anthony DeMello Awareness

Nothing to defend - Nothing to promote - Nothing to fear.

- Don Riso

We are not about eliminating the ego or transcending it, but really transforming it through being present with it.

- Russ Hudson

Spiritual Companion/Director

Certification Program

The EIOH Applied Professional Certification Training Program is online and involves three-weekend workshops, two essays, and one interview for a total of 53 IEA (International Enneagram Association) credit hours. The prerequisite is the Wisdom of the Enneagram AWTP workshop or

What is the Enneagram?

The Enneagram is a dynamic map of human personality that reveals how we organize experience and find meaning in our lives. It describes nine distinct patterns of attitude and behavior and reveals many of the reasons why…
